alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Greene; Martin; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 4:16AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greene, Pitt, southwestern Martin and northwestern Beaufort Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 416 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Fremont, or 13 miles west of Farmville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Washington, Winterville, Ayden, Farmville, Stokes, Bell Arthur, Pactolus, House, Black Jack, Bruce, Maury, Ormondsville, Roundtree, Lizzie, Old Ford, Pitt Greenville Airport, Dowdy Ficklen Stadium, East Carolina University and Chocowinity. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
